name: UPSTAND REWIND
description:
Brackey's Game Jam 2020, this is my first ever game jam I have contributed to. I had a lot of fun creating this simplistic game, with basic movement and features. When the theme was announced, I was super worried I wasn't getting any ideas but after looking at the definition, I was able to create a decent game.  [MAX 18 LEVELS];

>> MOVEMENTS 

A /D = LEFT / RIGHT

W  = JUMP

HOLD R  to rewind

ESC = PAUSE

If your here for the two special in game codes, it is 

- BRACKEYS in lowercase or uppercase

- The second one is on my twitter. @justpruthvi

Quick Tip:

> When you collected the diamonds, Hold R to Rewind all your previous moves until you are back at the start.

> Also use the Rewind Key as your advantage!

Thanks for trying out my game it means a lot :)
